Title: Speak Arabic': How Israel turned a language into a campaign of r...

Title: Physically, he's okay. Emotionally, we still don't know. He does...
Description: Eight months after Shlomi Ziv was rescued from Gaza in a military operation, his mother says he is still adjusting to the new reality. 'He is very excited when he sees more hostages being freed. Our hearts won't be whole until they all come back,' she says

Title: Embassy Down': New series on Israeli staff under attack in Cairo...
Description: Hamas' onslaught on October 7 happened while 'Embassy Down,' called 'Tahrir' in Hebrew, was still in production. The series borrows from a real-life attack on the Israeli Embassy in Cairo, but alas the series doesn't perceive Israel's deeds as a factor in shaping reality

Title: My brother's story might be the cruelest and most insane script ...
Description: Yossi and Eli Sharabi were close. They lived on Kibbutz Be'eri, their children were friends, and they spent summers together at the pool. Both were kidnapped by Hamas to Gaza, where Yossi was killed. Eli is slated to be released soon – and his surviving brother, Sharon, is tasked with telling him his family has been murdered

Title: Trump's plan to 'save' Gaza means killing the Palestinian nation ...
Description: Trump's ideas could turn out to be terribly clever or terribly dumb. But there's no doubt that they're inconceivably cruel. That cruelty is manifested in the fact that in declaring that the United States will take over Gaza, no one bothered to ask Palestinians at all

Title: The IDF commander and Land of Israel antiques dealer behind a tra...
Description: Col. (res) Yoav Yarom rose through the army ranks despite losing a leg in combat. Over the years his hobby of collecting ancient coins became a profession. In November 2024, in Lebanon, his love of history and his military career got entangled, and ended with the deaths of a scholar and a soldier

Title: U.S. Department of Education to investigate five universities ove...
Description: Columbia University, home of the first pro-Palestinian Gaza encampment on a U.S. campus, said it is 'looking forward' to working with the department on the issue, but many have warned the Trump administration's approach stifles free speech and unfairly targets Muslim, pro-Palestine, and Jewish activists

Title: Impractical, incomprehensible, illegal: Trump traps Netanyahu and...
Description: Trump's plan for the Gaza Strip that includes the relocation of 2 million Palestinians is not logical or viable. Whether it's an imperialist tantrum or an actual 'out of the box' initiative, there is really no way to endorse, refute or examine it

Title: Gallant says hostage deal was ready in summer, fewer murderers wo...
Description: In an interview with Yedioth Ahronoth and News Channel 12, former Defense Minister Yoav Gallant said over 100 prisoners serving life sentences to be exchanged for the hostages have been added since the deal was on the table over a year ago and also discussed Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's strong initial objection to strike in Lebanon

Title: Gallant says hostage deal was ready in summer, less murderers wou...
Description: In an interview with Yedioth Ahronoth and News Channel 12, former Defense Minister Yoav Gallant said over 100 prisoners serving life sentences to be exchanged for the hostages have been added since the deal was on the table over a year ago and also discussed Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's strong initial objection to strike in Lebanon

Title: Iran says Trump's concern about nuclear weapons can be resolved
Description: Iran's Foreign Minister Araqchi made the remarks after U.S. President Trump restored his 'maximum pressure' campaign, that includes efforts to drive Iran's oil exports down to zero in order to stop Tehran from obtaining a nuclear weapon

Title: The latest craze in Tel Aviv': Haaretz reports on the espresso t...
Description: Espressomania!': Espresso machines revolutionized many aspects of Tel Avivian life, becoming a new easy way of earning a living, changing conservative establishments and offering a whole new experience to coffee lovers

Title: Right-wing Israeli politicians celebrate Trump's calls for U.S. i...
Description: Ministers and party leaders of Israel's right wing issued enthusiastic statements following Trump's proposal that the U.S. take control of the Gaza Strip. Some members of the left also responded positively, but said the most important issue was continuing with the deal to return the hostages

Title: Delivering lasting peace' or 'new levels of illegality'? U.S. re...
Description: On Tuesday, President Trump announced his plan for the U.S. to assume control of Gaza as the Palestinians are taken in by countries with 'humanitarian hearts.' This 'isn't just extreme – it's completely detached from reality,' the CEO of the Jewish Democratic Council of America said

Title: Their Gaza ordeal may finally be over, but freed Thai hostages ar...
Description: Foreign hostages were invisible to the Israeli public and the government did not negotiated for their release. While they were greeted by a handful of well-wishers from the embassy and hospital staff – who prepared clothes, food and prayer area for them – their families celebrated thousands of miles away
